quiz.question: Which statement is used to test a condition in Java?
Which loop executes at least once even if the condition is false?
Which statement is used to execute one block of code among multiple options?
Which loop is used to iterate over a range of values?
Which statement is used to break out of a loop?
Which statement skips the current iteration of a loop and proceeds to the next iteration?
What does the if-else statement do?
options: Executes a block of code if a condition is true
Executes a block of code repeatedly
Executes one of many code blocks based on a value
Skips the current iteration of a loop
quiz.answer: Executes a block of code if a condition is true

quiz.question: Which keyword is used to terminate a loop immediately?
What does the while loop do?
options: Executes a block of code if a condition is true
Executes a block of code repeatedly
Executes one of many code blocks based on a value
Skips the current iteration of a loop
quiz.answer: Executes a block of code repeatedly
